text: @ForecasterEnten My Midwestern white non college degree Trump supporting mom is livid at him for his response. She recovered from COVID-19 luckily, but lost 7 neighbors in her retirement community. She also does not understand those who won't mask up. Nothing, until now as made her turn away.
